subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Drury scored two goals, including the winner 39 seconds into the third period, to help the Sabres take a 3-1 lead over the Islanders in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Chris Drury scored two goals, including the winner 39 seconds into the third period, to help the Sabres take a 3-1 lead over the Islanders in the best-of-seven series.
